properties.name: title
properties.description: The title for the page

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: The ID for the author of the object. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The ID for the parent of the post

properties.name: content
properties.description: The content for the page

properties.name: slug
properties.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the object unique to its type

properties.name: password
properties.description: A password to protect access to the content and excerpt

properties.name: pageTemplate
properties.description: Whether site uses elementor page builder

properties.name: template
properties.description: The theme file to use

properties.name: menuOrder
properties.description: The order of the page in relation to other pages

properties.name: featuredMediaId
properties.description: The ID of the featured media for the page

properties.name: pageId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the object

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: The ID for the author of the object. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: options
properties.description: The password for the page if it is password protected

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: author
properties.description: Limit result set to pages assigned to specific authors. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: before
properties.description: Limit response to pages published before a given ISO8601 compliant date

properties.name: page
properties.description: Current page of the collection

properties.name: search
properties.description: Limit results to those matching a string

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a page

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get a page

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get many pages

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update a page

properties.name: sticky
properties.description: Whether or not the object should be treated as sticky

properties.name: categories
properties.description: The terms assigned to the object in the category taxonomy. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: The terms assigned to the object in the post_tag taxonomy. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: postTemplate
properties.description: Whether site uses elementor page builder

properties.name: postId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the object

properties.name: excludedCategories
properties.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: excludedTags
properties.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: username
properties.description: Login name for the user

properties.name: name
properties.description: Display name for the user

properties.name: firstName
properties.description: First name for the user

properties.name: lastName
properties.description: Last name for the user

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email address for the user

properties.name: description
properties.description: Description of the user

properties.name: nickname
properties.description: The nickname for the user

properties.name: userId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the user

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL of the user

properties.name: reassign
properties.description: Reassign the deleted user's posts and links to this user ID
